alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Merced - Madera - Mendota; South End San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 11 at 5:59PM PST until January 12 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A DENSE FOG ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM PST THIS EVENING UNTIL 11 AM PST WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Visibilities in dense fog ranging from 800 feet to as low as 200 feet. * WHERE...Most of the San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...Valid from 9 PM PST this evening until 11 AM PST Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 198, Highway 41, Highway 43, Highway 180, Highway 152, and Highway 99 from McFarland northward.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use low beam headlights, and keep plenty of distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you.
